## Documentation Issue
What documentation needs to be updated or created?

## Location
- File path: [e.g. `docs/getting-started/local-development.md`]
- Section: [e.g. "Prerequisites"]

## Description
A clear and concise description of the documentation issue or improvement.

## Current State
What the documentation currently says (if applicable).

## Proposed Change
What the documentation should say or what should be added.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, links, or examples about the documentation issue here.
